entities.text: Detection and Representation of Ambiguities of Inten- sion

abstractContent.text: For the past 25 years, Bernard Vauquois headed a series of machine translation projects at the University of Grenoble in France that were distinguished by the consistent exploration of sophisticated computational linguistic techniques.
